ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: The hash algorithm used towards the corresponding NTP Server.

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-224
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating MAC using SHA2 hash function

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-256
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating MAC using SHA2 hash function

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-256-128
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating a 256 bits MAC using SHA2 hash function and truncate it to 128 bits

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-384
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating a 384 bits MAC using SHA2 hash function

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-384-192
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating a 384 bits MAC using SHA2 hash function and truncate it to 192 bits

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-512
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating a 512 bits MAC using SHA2 hash function

ns2:member.name: hmac-sha2-512-256
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Generating a 512 bits MAC using SHA2 hash function and truncate it to 256 bits
